item.title: Knowledge and Skills
item.description: Necessary knowledge, skills, and guides # can all be found at https://flowatoms.com. Over here, I’ll tell stories (e.g. how to build Flow Atoms), not repeat the same guides others have already written.

item.title: Stuff I Like & Use
item.description: Stuff I Like & Use # Things I love/own/want. Following the principle of buying fewer items of high quality to use longer. Not complete … to be continued Digital Setup # Hardware # iPhone Pro MacBook Pro 15’’ Apple Watch Ultra Freewrite Traveler Synology NAS DS220+ (with 2 Western Digitals 14TB WD Red Pro) Kindle Software # Obsidia Notion Things DEVONthink Zotero Anki Drafts 1Password Apple Mail Apple Calendar Synology Drive iCloud Firefox Apps # Fabolous Anki Waking Up Kindle Copilot Strong Down Dog Strava Wikipedia Audible OS # macOS Debian Startup stuff # Domain Registrar # Namecheap Webhosting # Digital Ocean Cloudways CMS/Site Generator # WordPress Hugo Shopify Email # Microsoft 365 Sendy DNS Management + Security # Cloudflare Office # Notebooks # Midori Moleskine Journal Moleskine Weekly Planner Pens # rOtring Mechanical Pencil Books # Man’s Search for Meaning “Surely You’re Joking, Mr.
